verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron, unto Aaron אַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah, You וּבָנֶ֤יךָ <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nei-cha Thou and thy sons וּבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> u-veit- house אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha and thy father's אִתָּ֔ךְ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tach, for תִּשְׂא֖וּ <S%H5375><s%> tis-'U with thee shall bear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֲוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> 'a-Von the iniquity הַמִּקְדָּ֑שׁ <S%H4720><s%> ham-mik-Dash; of the sanctuary וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah and you וּבָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nei-cha and thou and thy sons אִתָּ֔ךְ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tach, for תִּשְׂא֖וּ <S%H5375><s%> tis-'U with thee shall bear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֲוֹ֥ן <S%H5771><s%> 'a-Von the iniquity כְּהֻנַּתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H3550><s%> ke-hun-nat-Chem. of your priesthood

וְגַ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַחֶיךָ֩ <S%H251><s%> 'a-chei-Cha And thy brethren מַטֵּ֨ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh also of the tribe לֵוִ֜י <S%H3878><s%> le-Vi of Levi שֵׁ֤בֶט <S%H7626><s%> She-vet the tribe אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha of thy father הַקְרֵ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> hak-Rev bring אִתָּ֔ךְ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tach, for וְיִלָּו֥וּ <S%H3867><s%> ve-yil-la-Vu thou with thee that they may be joined עָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha with וִֽישָׁרְת֑וּךָ <S%H8334><s%> vi-sha-re-Tu-cha; unto thee and minister וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you וּבָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nei-cha unto thee but thou and thy sons אִתָּ֔ךְ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tach, for לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei with thee [shall minister] before אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel the tabernacle הָעֵדֻֽת׃ <S%H5715><s%> ha-'e-Dut. of witness

וְשָֽׁמְרוּ֙ <S%H8104><s%> ve-sha-me-Ru And they shall keep מִֽשְׁמַרְתְּךָ֔ <S%H4931><s%> mish-mar-te-Cha, thy charge וּמִשְׁמֶ֖רֶת <S%H4931><s%> u-mish-Me-ret and the charge כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all הָאֹ֑הֶל <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-hel; of all the tabernacle אַךְ֩ <S%H389><s%> 'aCh also אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to כְּלֵ֨י <S%H3627><s%> ke-Lei the vessels הַקֹּ֤דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh of the sanctuary וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach and the altar לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo or יִקְרָ֔בוּ <S%H7126><s%> yik-Ra-vu, only they shall not come nigh וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- or יָמֻ֥תוּ <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mu-tu that neither they nor ye also die גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- both הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> hem like גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- both אַתֶּֽם׃ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem. you

וְנִלְו֣וּ <S%H3867><s%> ve-nil-Vu And they shall be joined עָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha, with וְשָֽׁמְר֗וּ <S%H8104><s%> ve-sha-me-Ru, unto thee and keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִשְׁמֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H4931><s%> mish-Me-ret the charge אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed, of the congregation לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol for all עֲבֹדַ֣ת <S%H5656><s%> 'a-vo-Dat for all the service הָאֹ֑הֶל <S%H168><s%> ha-'O-hel; of the tabernacle וְזָ֖ר <S%H2114><s%> ve-Zar and a stranger לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- may not יִקְרַ֥ב <S%H7126><s%> yik-Rav shall not come nigh אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Chem. about

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֗ם <S%H8104><s%> u-she-mar-Tem, And ye shall keep אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et מִשְׁמֶ֣רֶת <S%H4931><s%> mish-Me-ret the charge הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh, of the sanctuary וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מִשְׁמֶ֣רֶת <S%H4931><s%> mish-Me-ret and the charge הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach; of the altar וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- will no יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od longer קֶ֖צֶף <S%H7110><s%> Ke-tzef that there be no wrath עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei any more upon the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni, Myself הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold לָקַ֙חְתִּי֙ <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach-ti And I behold I have taken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲחֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H251><s%> 'a-chei-Chem your brethren הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim, the Levites מִתּ֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> mit-Toch from among בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel לָכֶ֞ם la-Chem מַתָּנָ֤ה <S%H4979><s%> mat-ta-Nah [as] a gift נְתֻנִים֙ <S%H5414><s%> ne-tu-Nim to you [they are] given לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, for the LORD לַעֲבֹ֕ד <S%H5647><s%> la-'a-Vod to do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֲבֹדַ֖ת <S%H5656><s%> 'a-vo-Dat the service אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed. of the congregation

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you וּבָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nei-cha Therefore thou and thy sons אִ֠תְּךָ <S%H854><s%> 'It-te-cha for תִּשְׁמְר֨וּ <S%H8104><s%> tish-me-Ru with thee shall keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כְּהֻנַּתְכֶ֜ם <S%H3550><s%> ke-hun-nat-Chem your priest's office לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol everything דְּבַ֧ר <S%H1697><s%> de-Var for every thing הַמִּזְבֵּ֛חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach of the altar וּלְמִבֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> u-le-mib-Beit and within לַפָּרֹ֖כֶת <S%H6532><s%> lap-pa-Ro-chet the vail וַעֲבַדְתֶּ֑ם <S%H5647><s%> va-'a-vad-Tem; and ye shall serve עֲבֹדַ֣ת <S%H5656><s%> 'a-vo-Dat [unto you] as a service מַתָּנָ֗ה <S%H4979><s%> mat-ta-Nah, of gift אֶתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> 'et-Ten I have given אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כְּהֻנַּתְכֶ֔ם <S%H3550><s%> ke-hun-nat-Chem, your priest's office וְהַזָּ֥ר <S%H2114><s%> ve-haz-Zar and the stranger הַקָּרֵ֖ב <S%H7126><s%> hak-ka-Rev approach יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat. shall be put to death ס sa-Mek

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַהֲרֹן֒ <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron unto Aaron וַאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni Myself הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh now behold נָתַ֣תִּֽי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti Behold I also have given לְךָ֔ le-Cha, אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִשְׁמֶ֖רֶת <S%H4931><s%> mish-Me-ret thee the charge תְּרוּמֹתָ֑י <S%H8641><s%> te-ru-mo-Tai; of mine heave offerings לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol all קָדְשֵׁ֣י <S%H6918><s%> ka-de-Shei holy בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the children יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'el of Israel לְךָ֨ le-Cha נְתַתִּ֧ים <S%H5414><s%> ne-tat-Tim unto thee have I given לְמָשְׁחָ֛ה <S%H4888><s%> le-ma-she-Chah them by reason of the anointing וּלְבָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H1121><s%> u-le-va-Nei-cha and to thy sons לְחָק־ <S%H2706><s%> le-chok- by an ordinance עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. for ever

זֶֽה־ <S%H2088><s%> zeh- This יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become לְךָ֛ le-Cha מִקֹּ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> mik-Ko-desh This shall be thine of the most הַקֳּדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6944><s%> hak-ko-da-Shim holy things מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָאֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> ha-'Esh; [reserved] from the fire כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every קָ֠רְבָּנָם <S%H7133><s%> Ka-re-ba-nom every oblation לְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol every מִנְחָתָ֞ם <S%H4503><s%> min-cha-Tam of theirs every meat offering וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-le-chol- and every חַטָּאתָ֗ם <S%H2403><s%> chat-ta-Tam, of theirs and every sin offering וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-le-chol- and every אֲשָׁמָם֙ <S%H817><s%> 'a-sha-Mam of theirs and every trespass offering אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יָשִׁ֣יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shi-vu of theirs which they shall render לִ֔י Li, קֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh unto me [shall be] most קָֽדָשִׁ֥ים <S%H6944><s%> ka-da-Shim holy לְךָ֛ le-Cha ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he וּלְבָנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1121><s%> u-le-va-Nei-cha. for thee and for thy sons

בְּקֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> be-Ko-desh In the most הַקֳּדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6944><s%> hak-ko-da-Shim holy תֹּאכֲלֶ֑נּוּ <S%H398><s%> to-cha-Len-nu; [place] shalt thou eat כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every זָכָר֙ <S%H2145><s%> za-Char it every male יֹאכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> yo-Chal shall eat אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh it it shall be holy יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yeh- become לָּֽךְ׃ Lach.

וְזֶה־ <S%H2088><s%> ve-zeh- This לְּךָ֞ le-Cha תְּרוּמַ֣ת <S%H8641><s%> te-ru-Mat And this [is] thine the heave offering מַתָּנָ֗ם <S%H4976><s%> mat-ta-Nam, of their gift לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol all תְּנוּפֹת֮ <S%H8573><s%> te-nu-Fot with all the wave offerings בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לְךָ֣ le-Cha נְתַתִּ֗ים <S%H5414><s%> ne-tat-Tim, I have given וּלְבָנֶ֧יךָ <S%H1121><s%> u-le-va-Nei-cha them unto thee and to thy sons וְלִבְנֹתֶ֛יךָ <S%H1323><s%> ve-liv-no-Tei-cha and to thy daughters אִתְּךָ֖ <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Cha for לְחָק־ <S%H2706><s%> le-chok- with thee by a statute עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam; for ever כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- Everyone טָה֥וֹר <S%H2889><s%> ta-Hor every one that is clean בְּבֵיתְךָ֖ <S%H1004><s%> be-vei-te-Cha in thy house יֹאכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> yo-Chal shall eat אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To.

כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> kol All חֵ֣לֶב <S%H2459><s%> Che-lev All the best יִצְהָ֔ר <S%H3323><s%> yitz-Har, of the oil וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all חֵ֖לֶב <S%H2459><s%> Che-lev and all the best תִּיר֣וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> ti-Roosh of the wine וְדָגָ֑ן <S%H1715><s%> ve-da-Gan; and of the wheat רֵאשִׁיתָ֛ם <S%H7225><s%> re-shi-Tam the firstfruits אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יִתְּנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> yit-te-Nu of them which they shall offer לַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD לְךָ֥ le-Cha נְתַתִּֽים׃ <S%H5414><s%> ne-tat-Tim. them have I given

בִּכּוּרֵ֞י <S%H1061><s%> bik-ku-Rei [And] whatsoever is first ripe כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּאַרְצָ֛ם <S%H776><s%> be-'ar-Tzam in the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יָבִ֥יאוּ <S%H935><s%> ya-Vi-'u which they shall bring לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD לְךָ֣ le-Cha יִהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh; shall be yours כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- everyone טָה֥וֹר <S%H2889><s%> ta-Hor shall be thine every one that is clean בְּבֵיתְךָ֖ <S%H1004><s%> be-vei-te-Cha in thine house יֹאכֲלֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> yo-cha-Len-nu. shall eat
כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- Every חֵ֥רֶם <S%H2764><s%> Che-rem Every thing devoted בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El in Israel לְךָ֥ le-Cha יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh. become
